text: Masmaram is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Thampi Kannanthanam, starring Suresh Gopi and Aparna Rao in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/masmaram-malayalam-movie/ The film was dubbed into Telugu as Sathru Vamsam.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pUjqWC1kiBw ==Plot== It is a story of corporate rivalry of two textile tycoons, one who attempt to modernize and gain market share, and one who attempt to use any sorts of evil doing and make money. The injustice in-between brings forth a lot of unaccountable evil deeds, and for all of it Gautham holds the evil doer accountable with his life. ==Cast== * Suresh Gopi as Gautham Vishwanath * Kitty as Darshan Das * T. R. Omana as Darshan Das' mother * Arpana Rao as Priyadarshini Das, Darshan Das' daughter * Maniyanpilla Raju as Krishnanunni * Sathaar as Mahadevan * Rajan P. Dev as Willson Moriz * Srividya as Mariya Moriz * Vijaya Kumar as Jerry, Moriz's son * Ruthika Singh as Sherin, Moriz's daughter * Jyothi Meena as Jenny, Moriz's clerk and girlfriend * Hemanth Ravan as Hemanth * Vallathol Unnikrishnan as Moriz's secretary * Krishna Kumar as A.S.P. Vishnu IPS, SI Jayamani's son) * Kollam Ajith as SI Jayamani * Devan as Munna Bhaai * as Jasmine, Munna Bhai's daughter * Prathapachandran as Justice Ramanathan * as Justice Ramanathan's daughter Roopa * N. F. Varghese as Viswanathan * as Vishwanathan's wife Madhavi * as Vishwanathan's daughter ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Thampi Kannanthanam
title: Masmaram
